text:
Nicholas Victor Leslie Henson (12 May 1945 – 15 December 2019) was an English actor. He joined the Royal Shakespeare Company in 1977. He was known for his roles in "Witchfinder General" (1968), "There's a Girl in My Soup" (1970), "Mosquito Squadron" (1970) and "Psychomania" (1971).
Henson died on 15 December 2019 from lymphoma, aged 74.

annotations.surface_form: There's a Girl in My Soup
